content: Since the strikes were a reaction to what appear to be chemical attacks on civilians, I think it’s pretty clear that the aim of those strikes was to inhibit further chemical attacks. Don’t see much ambiguity there. There is also the possibility that the strikes under the pretext of defending civilians were a trial run at deeper military involvement in Syria. World reaction has been generally positive — that may encourage Trump to use this option more. Long-term is another issue — and complicated, involving Assad, Russia, Iran, Israel, and IS.
